name: Out Of Memory (Abhishek Joshi, Abhay_Joshi)
description:
Its a 2d shooter game , You play this game as a game tester , your job is to survive from errors in the game.

This game is made in 48 hrs for BYOG 2022, The theme of this game is "It's not supposed to do that"

How To Play:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

LeftMouseButton - Shoot

Music By -  Context Sensitive
